alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 5:06PM MST until August 24 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... South Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 915 PM MST. * At 506 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Indian Wash at Highway 95. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Yuma and South Central La Paz Counties This includes the following highways... AZ Route 95 between mile markers 63 and 72. This includes the following streams and drainages... Castle Dome Wash, Gould Wash, Angeles Wash, Los, Gravel Wash, Tyson Wash, Tenmile Wash and Indian Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
